The coil features rifled tubing to enhance refrigerant flow, while lanced coil fins increase surface contact between metal and air. All combine for maximum heat transfer and efficiency.

heading: Warranty
desc: AirEase’s commitment to a better product is backed by a 10-Year Limited Warranty on parts.
